item.title: Filter Ebs Snapshot By Date With Go
item.description: Hello! Today I will show how you can filter ebs snapshots by date with golang. To begin with I will create a folder and in it, I will initialize the go module mkdir snapshotFilter cd snapshotFilter go mod init snapshotFilter You need to create main.go which will contain the code. Let’s start with the main function and imports package main import ( "flag" "fmt" "log" "sort" "time" "github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go/aws" "github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go/aws/session" "github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go/service/ec2" ) func main() { sess := session.
